briefdescription.para: A type alias to describe a set of dimensions that can be used to index a vector (e.g. x to get E_x).

A type alias to find a VectorIndexSet describing the covariant indices from a VectorIndexSet describing contravariant indices or to find a VectorIndexSet describing the contravariant indices from a VectorIndexSet describing covariant indices.
A compile-time boolean to check if all the dimensions in a VectorIndexSet can represent covariant indices.
A compile-time boolean to check if all the dimensions in a VectorIndexSet can represent contravariant indices.
